scripts.format: npm run format:html && npm run format:css && npm run format:js
scripts.lint: npm run format && npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp -R src/* dist/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:visual
scripts.start-and-test: http-server ./dist -p 8080 & sleep 5; npm run test; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; kill $!; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
